title: Strobeck’s Candyland
content:
A Chadourne video last week, and now a 30 minute project by Strobeck straight to youtube?!

We are definetly spoiled with motivation before the beggining of winter, to say the least.

Enjoy 30 minute of classic Strobeck, with the now world-famous “head to toe” filming, for the opening of Supreme San Francisco.

Nice to see the tribute toÂ Pablo Ramirez (P-spliff), a notorious GX1000 skater who died earlier this year and was already an SF local, and the new Supreme team member : Kader Sylla.
author: thomas
video: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Yk1cLKpzHck" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
